items.sentence: Tom wished that he were able to visit Boston more often.
Tom wished that he hadn't asked Mary to stop doing that.
French isn't taught in our schools the way it should be.
I think it would be a good idea for you to study French.
I think it would be a good idea for you to learn French.
Tom needs to know that we'll help him if he wants us to.
Tom needs to understand that that's not going to happen.
Tom couldn't understand why Mary wanted to learn French.
Tom has a hard time blocking out extraneous information.
I'm afraid that it would be difficult for us to do that.
